service_15000: Underbody panels: visual inspection for completeness, secure installation and damage
Visual inspection for leaks from underneath (oils and other fluids)
Brake lines: visual inspection for damage, routing and corrosion
Brake hoses: visual inspection for damage
Emergency call system (ERA-GLONASS, EVAK, ERA-RB): Check battery condition (Eurasian Customs Union only)
In vehicles from model year 2022 with Connect Release 3.1: Reset the Smart Service values for the replaced components
